pages.text: This Ancient Desert is home to many lost secrets, it hasnt rained in a thousand years, Anubis is the king of these lands and his army of mummies wander these sands at night.$(br2)Find Anubis's temple and challenge him and his hoardes in a great showdown, Keep your eyes peeled for any Oasis's as this may be your only chance of water, that is if you can see one in the thick sandstorm.

pages.title: Ancient Sands
pages.text: Cycle through the Images to see the Ancient Sands, Ancient Pyramid and Oasis.
